name: Sphere Game (D.P.L.D.S)
description:
NOTE: When purchasing a Steam code will be given

Sphere is a platform game, where the player needs to show skills to pass the level and face various obstacles ahead, controlling a heavy sphere. Sphere Game available on the Steam and Windows store,Xbox  and Windows 10.
